original_title: Dare the Devil! ... Disciples of Evel
overview: Discover how daredevils and stunt performers manage to do the jaw-dropping things they do. Inspired by renowned stunt master Evel Knievel, the film showcases athletes and engineers who make the dangerous so riveting they earn top billing in this collection of awesome footage that has never previously been aired.
title: Dare the Devil! ... Disciples of Evel
